title: B18 Cavanaugh - RED INFIELD - EXTREMELY RARE!!!
author: Bugsy

posts.post_title: B18 Cavanaugh - RED INFIELD - EXTREMELY RARE!!!
posts.post_content:
This is an EXTREMELY rare red infield B18 Blanket.  The red is a printing error and only occurred with the Detroit Tigers and Boston Braves.  These were supposed to be brown infields, but there was an error with the ink.  This one is in flawless condition.  Very clean and vibrant.  There is also a slight remnants of the factory label on the back.  

Lew Lipset sold several a few years ago for over $3,000 each.  I am looking for $1,295 + shipping.

[url]http://www.oldjudge.com/?showpage=/archive/20100401/b18-red-infield-blankets/&i=135[/url]

Thanks.

Chris
[url]staindsox@hotmail.com[/url]

Wow -- I own two of them, but I think that's the nicest looking red infield I've ever seen!

Greg
Thanks guys!  I guess there aren't many B18 collectors out there anymore :)
